Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run bit of hesitation, and had Richardson stopped the ball, a run-out was on.

Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run and again. Rohit works it away to square leg and keeps the strike

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run wicket-to-wicket, blocked

Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run good length ball, defended.

Zampa to Rohit Sharma, OUT so classy for so much of this first hour, Rohit looks very clumsy falling over to this missed sweep and is given lbw. But he's gone for the review! And it's frankly a terrible review. He clearly lost his bearings falling off balance losing any sense of where
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run full on fifth stump, driven crisply to the cover sweeper to get off the mark.
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run fullish length on middle, whipped along the ground straight to midwicket.

Cummins to Kohli, no run short and wide outside off, goes to cut, beaten for pace.
Cummins to Kohli, no run short on fifth stump, shuffles across in defense.
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs silky! Like buttah! In the slot in fifth stump, firm press, hardly a flourish, all timing in the gap between extra cover and mid-off. Yum.
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run good length ball on off stump, shuffles back and across to flick this through midwicket.

Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs fuller length this time on the same line, encourages a crisp drive past extra cover, sweeper does well sliding at the rope to keep it to two, Labuschagne. Or did he? Some doubt about his back heel possibly clipping the boundary padding. Trick photography with th
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run full on off, driven through more directly to the cover sweeper.

Cummins to Kohli, no run good length ball on the stumps, defended.
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run short and wide, cut to deep third man.

Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller on off stump, goes deep on his crease to tip and run behind point.
Zampa to Kohli, FOUR runs quicker and flatter on middle stump at 95 kph, lands too short though and Kohli pumps a pull behind square. Zampa with hands on head as it races to the backward square rope.
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run flighted more on off at 90 kph, driven to the cover sweeper.
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run uses his feet to drive a full ball from off stump to long-off.
Zampa to Kohli, no run flighted full on middle at 90 kph, defended with a big stride forward back to Zampa.
Agar to S Dhawan, no run good length ball on off, defended.
Agar to S Dhawan, FOUR runs fuller on fifth stump, caresses this drive through the covers, beats the sweeper with ease to the rope.

Zampa to Kohli, 1 run driven down the ground
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run tickled to fine leg
Agar to Kohli, 1 run driven down to long-on
Agar to S Dhawan, no run runs down the wicket, but Agar rushes the ball through. Dhawan has to adjust and rives it back to the bowler
Agar to S Dhawan, no run blocked
Agar to S Dhawan, no run worked to the onside. Thought about a run, but the onrushing fielder made him reconsider
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run that's another way to get a single. Goes over the top, clears mid-on, and the ball goes on the bounce to long-on
Agar to Kohli, 1 run keeps the strike after prodding this one to the leg side
Starc to Kohli, 1 run begins with one around the ribcage, nurdled down to fine leg
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run and that's a half-century for Dhawan! Two in as many ODIs. His 29th half-century. The previous game will remind him he needs more than that
Starc to Kohli, no run crunched to extra cover, the timing not there to find a gap
Starc to Kohli, 1 run persists with the leg stump line to Kohli. Too easy for him to nudge it to fine leg once more
Starc to S Dhawan, FOUR runs flashes, flashes hard, flashes hard enough the edge beats a leaping wicketkeeper! Races away for four. Decent delivery from Starc, deserved a better outcome
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run sends this down the legside, and Dhawan helps it on to fine leg. Good over for India again
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run darts it through, Dhawan works it away to the on side
Agar to Kohli, 1 run back foot punch to long-off. Agar isn't offering much flight
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run tickled to short fine
Agar to Kohli, 1 run rushes this one even quicker, Kohli content to send it back down the ground for one

Starc to S Dhawan, no run dragged back, driven to mid-off
Starc to S Dhawan, no run bouncer. Seemed a bit high, but Starc gets away with it

Starc to S Dhawan, no run cramps him for room, Dhawan blocks
Agar to Kohli, no run bit of air given to the ball, Kohli whacks it back to the bowler. On the bounce, mind you. Relax
Agar to Kohli, no run and again, straight back to Agar
Agar to Kohli, 1 run more flight, slight turn, opens the face of the bat
Agar to S Dhawan, FOUR runs lifts it over midwicket, exquisite sweep shot. Not much wrong with the delivery, really, but Dhawan's timing and placement is superb
Agar to S Dhawan, FOUR runs and now the reverse sweep comes out! Helps it beat the third man fielder. Dhawan's moving up gears!
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run keeps the strike. 10 from the over
Labuschagne to S Dhawan, FOUR runs disdainfully sliced to the backward point boundary. Dhawan on fire isn't the best time to be asked to come on. Especially if you're a part-timer
Labuschagne to S Dhawan, 1 run uppish, nearly a caught-and-bowled. Chipped it over the bowler's head, no timing. Had Marnus been three inches taller, Dhawan would be gone
Labuschagne to Kohli, 1 run eased to deep midwicket
Labuschagne to S Dhawan, 1 run dragged down, fortunate Dhawan found the on side boundary rider instead of a gap
Labuschagne to Kohli, 1 run block and run
Labuschagne to S Dhawan, no run pushes Dhawan onto the back foot. Muffled appeal
Agar to Kohli, 1 run opens the bat face to short third. Good running again
Agar to S Dhawan, no run runs down the ground, nearly yorks himself, though. Rare dot delivery
Agar to S Dhawan, SIX runs that's enormous. Dances down the track and absolutely thwacks this into the stand behind cow corner. The sweetness of the timing on that!
Agar to S Dhawan, FOUR runs and the poor ball comes. Down the onside, and Dhawan helps it to the fine leg boundary. This may well be Agar's last over
Agar to S Dhawan, no run strikes him on the pad. Slight appeal from Agar
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run and Dhawan keeps the strike. 12 from this over. Are India finally moving up a gear?
Labuschagne to S Dhawan, no run smart bowling. Dhawan gave it away early by coming down the wicket, Labuschagne drags it down

Labuschagne to S Dhawan, no run bit more flight. Slightly uppish on its way to midwciket

Labuschagne to S Dhawan, FOUR runs ruins the over for Australia. Just outside leg stump, and Dhawan helps it on with a cross batted thump. Beats fine leg. 6 from that one
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 2 runs backfoot punch through the covers. The sweeper on the boundary has a chase on, and keeps it to two
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run slower ball, Kohli reads it early, and works it away to the on-side. Partnership is 99 now
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs the hundred partnership comes up! And how! Sees the slower ball early, rocks back, waits for it, and deposits it back over Richardson's head for four

Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, OUT what just happened there! Dhawan has holed out for 96! It was under the armpit, the line Australia have targeted for so long. Dhawan used the pace, timed it perfectly, but saw it carry straight to the fielder at fine leg. Tremendous innings, but doesn'
Kane Richardson to Iyer, no run welcomes him to the crease with a bouncer. Iyer is an interesting move, though
Kane Richardson to Iyer, no run short of a length. 7 runs and a wicket from the 29th
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run crunched through the offside

Zampa to Iyer, no run blocked
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run gets off the mar with a quick single on the offside
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run flicked to the onside. Flatter to Kohli
Zampa to Iyer, no run flight, and driven to extra cover. Just 2 off that Zampa over, and here's Peter to take you through the next 10
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run back of a length on off stump, guided to deep third man.

Starc to Kohli, 2 runs full pitching outside leg, clipped behind square.
Starc to Kohli, no run fullish length on fourth stump, pushed to extra cover.
Starc to Kohli, 1 run good length on fourth stump, guided to deep third man.

Zampa to Kohli, 1 run flighted full on off, driven hard back to Zampa at head height, oohs from the crowd as he spills it but it was a bump ball, misfield caroms wide of mid-off for a run.
Zampa to Iyer, no run full and wide, driven to backward point.
Zampa to Iyer, no run full on off, scuffs a drive back to Zampa.

Zampa to Iyer, OUT scratchy knock comes to an end with an ungainly hoick. Pressure was building ever so slightly on Shreyas, Zampa floats this one up on a fullish length on middle stump, the batsman goes for an impetuous flick heave across the line and misses badly. Middle stump knock
Zampa to Rahul, no run stretches forward to a full ball and pushes this tentatively short of extra cover.
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run flatter and shorter on the stumps at 82 kph, goes back to flick behind square.

Starc to Kohli, 1 run short and wide, tapped into the off side to keep strike for the 35th.
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run good length ball on the stumps, clipped off the back foot behind square.

Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs yum yum yum! Fullish length on about fifth stump, but Kohli shuffles back and across to whip this through midwicket.
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs hummana hummana! Same line and length, this time Kohli stays in his crease and drives it through extra cover.
Cummins to Kohli, no run good length ball on off stump, tries to tap and run, can't get it away.

Agar to Kohli, 1 run flighted full on fourth stump, pushed firmly to long-off.

Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run missed runout opportunity! Slower ball on off stump guided to Smith at backward point. Rahul took off from the non-striker's end, Smith tried to guide a throw back to Richardson over the stumps instead of firing for a direct hit. Too gentle and allowed
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run good length on fifth stump, cut to the sweeper.

Zampa to Kohli, 1 run worked away for one

Zampa to Rahul, 1 run paddled away to the leg side

Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run ungainly hoick that's nowhere near the middle. Jadeja on strike

Kane Richardson to Jadeja, no run guided to backward point. Thinks about a run, thinks again

Starc to Rahul, 1 run short ball, helped away to the leg side

Cummins to Rahul, 1 run keeps the strike for the last over
Starc to Rahul, 1 run no timing from the batsman. Went straight up but into a gap.
